description: This file defines a base class 'Reader' for reading and chunking documents, including asynchronous processing capabilities, as part of a document processing system.

classes.name: Reader
classes.description: A base class for reading documents with support for chunking and asynchronous operations.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Method to read documents from an object; to be implemented by subclasses.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronous method to read documents from an object; to be implemented by subclasses.

methods.name: chunk_document
methods.description: Chunks a single document using the specified chunking strategy.

methods.name: chunk_documents_async
methods.description: Asynchronously chunks a list of documents in parallel.
